meta.name: description
meta.content: Motley Co. ISD in partnership with our community and staff, will develop within our students the ability to become independent, confident, life-long learners; equipped with the knowledge to pursue their goals. MC ISD is a public school district based in Motley County. The consolidated school district serves Flomot, Matador, Northfield, Roaring Springs, and Whiteflat. The school has one campus located in Matador, TX with students from Pre K-3 through twelfth.

strong.class: hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg visible-xl pull-left site_sub_title
text-center visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg hidden-xl site_sub_title

div.p: On Friday, April 17, 2020, Governor Greg Abbott announced that doctors advise it would be unsafe to reopen public schools. Therefore, school classrooms are closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. The closure pertains to all institutions including public, private and higher education. Teachers will be allowed in their classrooms for video instruction, administrative duties or to clean out the classroom. TEA director Mike Morath will have more complete instructions with details on how to proceed with the completion of the year and how to conduct graduation ceremonies. SCHOOL IS NOT OUT UNTIL MAY 20, 2020. Packets will still be provided to students as well as continuing online learning. Meals will be provided. Parent logs for student activity will need to be turned in. Each student is responsible for his/her completion of instruction until the end of the school year.

Motley Co. ISD welcomes you to the new website. We will work at making it informative, up to date, and fun to visit. Please scroll down to the bottom of the page to our new section for E-Notes. When you subscribe to E-Notes you are signing up to receive emails or texts from the administration and teachers when they have information to share, whether about classroom assignments, special programs, field trips or weather closure alerts. This is just one more way to stay informed.
